statements: DELETE FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE title = 'Sample Title';
DELETE FROM LiteratureReviewDatabase WHERE id = 1 AND author = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM publications WHERE title = 'Example Book' AND author = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM literature_reviews WHERE author = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM new_research_findings WHERE id = 1 AND topic = 'Artificial Intelligence'
DELETE FROM research_findings WHERE researcher = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM publications WHERE authors LIKE '%Alice%' AND publication_date < '2022-01-01';
